title: Silk & Steel Series #1-3 and The Black Prince
description: The four full-length novels in the bestselling Silk & Steel series. Elves and dragons battle for supremacy as a tortured dragon prince and a lethal elf assassin fight for their impossible love. Buy the stunning, emotional, epic, and award-winning MM fantasy series today. Includes the full-length novels: Silk & Steel Iron & Fire Blood & Ice The Black Prince Over 360,000 words in one set!
author: Ariana Nash
